events.title: Događaji
events.description: Fire an event on the event bus.
events.alert_event_type: Event type is a mandatory field

services.title: Usluge
services.description: The service dev tool allows you to call any available service in Home Assistant.
services.yaml_parameters: Parameters only available in YAML mode
services.accepts_target: This service accepts a target, for example: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
services.no_template_ui_support: The UI does not support templates, you can still use the YAML editor.

states.title: Status
states.description1: Set the current state representation of an entity within Home Assistant.
states.description2: If the entity belongs to a device, there will be no actual communication with that device.

templates.title: Predlošci
templates.description: Templates are rendered using the Jinja2 template engine with some Home Assistant specific extensions.
templates.time: This template updates at the start of each minute.
templates.all_listeners: This template listens for all state changed events.
templates.no_listeners: This template does not listen for any events and will not update automatically.
templates.listeners: This template listens for the following state changed events:

issues.units_changed: The unit of this entity changed from ''{metadata_unit}'' to ''{state_unit}''.
issues.unsupported_state_class: The state class ''{state_class}'' of this entity is not supported.
issues.entity_not_recorded: This entity is excluded from being recorded.
issues.entity_no_longer_recorded: This entity is no longer being recorded.
issues.no_state: There is no state available for this entity.

units_changed.title: The unit of this entity changed
units_changed.update: Update the unit of the historic statistic values from ''{metadata_unit}'' to ''{state_unit}'', without converting.
units_changed.clear: Delete all old statistic data for this entity

validation.heading: Provjera konfiguracije
validation.introduction: Provjerite svoju konfiguraciju ako ste nedavno napravili neke promjene u konfiguraciji i želite biti sigurni da je sve ispravno

reloading.heading: Ponovno učitavanje konfiguracije
reloading.introduction: Neki dijelovi programa Home Assistant mogu se ponovno učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Pritiskom na ponovno učitavanje učitava se nova konfiguracija.

server_management.heading: Upravljanje poslužiteljem
server_management.confirm_restart_text: Restarting Home Assistant will stop all your active dashboards, automations and scripts.
server_management.confirm_stop: Jeste li sigurni da želite zaustaviti Home Assostant?
